summary: The name \"Orcish Berserker Greasword\" worked and stuck.. but there is some ebony in the fashioning of the sword.
descriptionHtml:
Standalone Orcish Craftable Weapon

This weapon has enhanced damage by 1 point over vanilla Daedric, and enhanced criticals, stagger, and speed over all the weapons available in vanilla skyrim. It would be considered a cheat item.. however, you have to craft one to have one unless you use the console, and the crafting takes over 15 materials to produce one..
For Craft: Ebony, Orichalcum, Leather Strips, Dragon Bone
Refine: Ebony, Orichalcum, Dragon Scales.

The bonuses are only slight, but still favourable and intuitive for the \'greatsword\' (staggering, criticals, speed). It should work fine with other mods.

v1.0
ESP made with SkyEdit0.05a.
v1.1
New Nif Files for specular change, and new textures.
v1.2
Fixed errors on color map. (Pic of v1.1 still closely resembles current texturing)
v1.3
Added Better Normal map for Edge Serration

Known Bugs:
 It does clip a lot (when dropped) because the nif file isn\'t perfect. I am sorry.

Future Plans:
I may change the normal map.

Enjoy - share your images of it. It doesn\'t have even a cubemap so I know more can be done to it, if anyone makes changes I would like to see them and possibly host them.
author: CurseOfDarkness
